entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023
